metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25901 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Versions of the package cookiejar before 2.1.4 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the Cookie.parse function, which uses an insecure regular expression.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25901` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-cookiejar - 2.1.4+~2.1.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-cookiejar package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.4+~2.1.2-1').
